{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys E1200 001.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless N300 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- http://homestore.cisco.com/viewproduct.htm?productId=129966524 --> |sp = https://www.linksys.com/nz/support-product?pid=01t80000003KRTzAAO |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = Linksys_E1200_v1.0 |wikidevi = Linksys_E1200_v1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = E1200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/28/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Linksys_E1200_v1.0 |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = 1081 |fcc_id = Q87-E1200 |icid = 3839A-E1200 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM5357B0; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 300 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L3206E; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6JH-5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = IEEE 802.3/3u |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 58:6D:8F, C0:C1:C0 |oui = 58:6D:8F, C0:C1:C0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = CyberTAN |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT,Tomato Hyzoom,Tomato (Shibby)
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/07/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004T9RR6I |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 7.43" x 1.23" x 5.97" |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== E1200 v1 serial numbers may start with ''1081''
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=141334 Cisco Linksys E1200 Rev1.0 and dd-wrt] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90346 New Linksys Router (E1200; E1500; E2500; E3200)]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=141334 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (part numbers and board image) :"3763-11400102R" is silkscreened on the board. *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=153176 ''Linksys Cisco E1200 V2 DD-WRT Supported'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] (v1 label shot) :58:6D:8F OUI on the label in GOATSE's label shot *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=90346 New Linksys Router (E1200; E1500; E2500; E3200)]
===Flashing Tomato=== *Supported by [http://tomato.groov.pl/download/K26RT-N/ K26RT-N] builds of Tomato by Shibby. :Also supported by [http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tomato-hyzoom-bwq518-releases.70364/ Tomato Hyzoom]
==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 1 = vcc (3.3v) 2 = tx 3 = rx 4 = n/c 5 = ground
==USB Info== Possible Mod to add
